content:
IT IS lass="word-wrap-span">COMMON knowledge that smoking marijuana causes cravings for high-lass="word-wrap-span">calorie snacks. lass="word-wrap-span">The condition, known as lass="word-wrap-span">The munchies, is a staple of popular culture. (lass="word-wrap-span">Snoop Dogg, a rapper lass="word-wrap-span">And notorious stoner, even penned a lass="word-wrap-span">cookbook.) lass="word-wrap-span">Yet lass="word-wrap-span">empirical evidence of lass="word-wrap-span">The phenomenon lass="word-wrap-span">And its effects is scarce. lass="word-wrap-span">Does getting high cause smokers to consume more junk food? lass="word-wrap-span">And if so, by how much?

To answer this question, Michele Baggio of the lass="word-wrap-span">University of lass="word-wrap-span">Connecticut and lass="word-wrap-span">Alberto Chong of Georgia lass="word-wrap-span">State lass="word-wrap-span">University examined lass="word-wrap-span">State laws in lass="word-wrap-span">America. lass="word-wrap-span">Since the mid-1990s, more than 30 lass="word-wrap-span">States have authorised marijuana for medical purposes and 11 have legalised it for recreational use. lass="word-wrap-span">Because these laws were lass="word-wrap-span">enacted at different times and in different places, they created a natural experiment for researchers to study the effects of marijuana—including its effect on food lass="word-wrap-span">consumption.

lass="word-wrap-span">With this in mind, lass="word-wrap-span">Messrs Baggio and Chong collected monthly sales data from supermarkets, drug stores and other retailers in more than 2,000 counties across 48 states covering the period from 2006 to 2016. By comparing sales figures from neighbouring counties located along state borders—some where marijuana was legal and some where it was not—the authors were able to lass="word-wrap-span">estimate the effect of marijuana legalisation on junk-food sales.

lass="word-wrap-span">They found that after recreational marijuana was legalised in lass="word-wrap-span">Colorado, lass="word-wrap-span">Oregon and Washington, lass="word-wrap-span">The only states for which 18 months of sales data were available, sales of ice cream rose by 3.1%, sales of cookies increased by 4.1% and sales of lass="word-wrap-span">crisps jumped by 5.3% in lass="word-wrap-span">The years after lass="word-wrap-span">The laws were passed (see chart).

lass="word-wrap-span">Marijuana may affect our shopping habits in other ways, too. In another paper, Baggio and Chong, along with Sungoh Kwon of the lass="word-wrap-span">University of lass="word-wrap-span">Connecticut, found that legalising medical lass="word-wrap-span">Marijuana reduced lass="word-wrap-span">alcohol sales by more than 12%. lass="word-wrap-span">This “substitution effect” was larger than previously thought and lasted for up to two years after legalisation (see chart).

lass="word-wrap-span">One explanation for this effect may be that some people use lass="word-wrap-span">alcohol to treat pain. lass="word-wrap-span">When medical marijuana becomes available, they swap lass="word-wrap-span">One pain reliever for another. A sensible approach, perhaps, given the relative harm posed by lass="word-wrap-span">excessive lass="word-wrap-span">alcohol use. lass="word-wrap-span">Those watching their weight, however, may want to avoid the snack lass="word-wrap-span">aisle.

ex: n. 状态；国家；状况；州
v. 说明；陈述；声明；规定
adj. 国家提供（或控制）的；国事礼仪（或规格）的；州的；邦的
网络 状态模式；政府；情形
eg2: a confused state of mind
思绪纷乱
He was in a state of permanent depression.
他一直处于消沉状态。
anxieties about the state of the country's economy
对于国家经济状况的担忧
The building is in a bad state of repair(= needs to be repaired) .
那座房子年久失修。
She was in a state of shock .
她震惊不已。
Look at the state of you! You can't go out looking like that.
看看你这副样子！你可不能就这么出去。
You're not in a fit state to drive.
你现在的状态不宜开车。
the Baltic States
波罗的海诸国

欧盟成员国
the states of Victoria and Western Australia
维多利亚州和西澳大利亚州
the southern states of the US
美国南方各州
matters/affairs of state
国家大事
people who are financially dependent on the state
依靠国家救济的人
a state-owned company
国营公司
They wish to limit the power of the State.
他们希望限制政府权力。
The president was driven in state through the streets.
总统乘车隆重地从街上穿过。
I've never been to the States.
我从未去过美国。
She was in a real state about her exams.
她对考试感到很紧张。
What a state this place is in!
这地方真够乱的！
She was in a real state about her exams.
她对考试感到很紧张。
What a state this place is in!
这地方真够乱的！
This state of affairs can no longer be ignored.
再不能无视这种情况了。
This state of affairs can no longer be ignored.
再不能无视这种情况了。
What is the current state of play in the peace talks?
和平谈判目前进展得怎么样？
What is the current state of play in the peace talks?
和平谈判目前进展得怎么样？
state education
公办教育
families dependent on state benefits(= in Britain, money given by the government to people who are poor)
靠政府救济金生活的家庭
state secrets(= information that could be harmful to a country if it were discovered by an enemy)
国家机密
The Queen is on a state visit to Moscow.
女王正对莫斯科进行国事访问。
the state opening of Parliament
隆重的议会开幕式
the state apartments(= used for official ceremonies)
国事活动厅

州监狱、州立医院、州立大学等
state police/troopers
州警察
a state tax
州税
He has already stated his intention to run for election.
他已声明打算参加竞选。
The facts are clearly stated in the report.
报道对事实真相作了清楚的说明。
There is no need to state the obvious(= to say sth that everyone already knows) .
显而易见的事实就不必陈述了。
State clearly how many tickets you require.
说清楚你需要多少张票。
He stated categorically that he knew nothing about the deal.
他明确表示对那笔交易一无所知。
It was stated that standards at the hospital were dropping.
据称，那家医院的医疗水准在不断下降。
The contract was stated to be invalid.
那份合同宣布作废。
This is not one of their stated aims.
在他们宣布的目标里没有这一条。
You must arrive at the time stated.
你必须在规定时间到达。
Do not exceed the stated dose(= of medicine) .
不要超过规定的剂量。

ex: prep. 用；和；有；具有
网络 和…一起；带有；以
eg2: She lives with her parents.
她同父母住在一起。
I have a client with me right now.
我现在有个客户。
a nice steak with a bottle of red wine
一份美味牛排再加上一瓶红葡萄酒
a girl with(= who has) red hair
一位红发女郎
a jacket with a hood
带风帽的短上衣
He looked at her with a hurt expression.
他带着受伤害的神情看着她。
They're both in bed with flu.
他们双双患流感卧病在床。
a man with a suitcase
提衣箱的男子
Cut it with a knife.
用刀把它切开。
It is treated with acid before being analysed.
对它先用酸处理再进行分析。
The bag was stuffed with dirty clothes.
袋子里塞满了脏衣服。
Sprinkle the dish with salt.
在这盘菜上撒上盐。
to fight with sb
与某人打架
to play tennis with sb
与某人打网球
at war with a neighbouring country
与邻国交战
I had an argument with my boss.
我跟老板吵了一架。
Be careful with the glasses.
小心这些玻璃杯。
Are you pleased with the result?
你对结果满意吗？
Don't be angry with her.
别生她的气。
With these students it's pronunciation that's the problem.
对这些学生来说，成问题的是发音。
She won't be able to help us with all the family commitments she has.
她有这么多家务事，帮不了我们。
It's much easier compared with last time.
这与上次相比容易得多。
The meal with wine came to $20 each.
包括酒这顿饭每人 20 块钱。
With all the lesson preparation I have to do I work 12 hours a day.
加上必须的备课在内，我每天工作 12 个小时。
He behaved with great dignity.
他举止庄重威严。
She sleeps with the window open.
她爱开着窗户睡觉。
Don't stand with your hands in your pockets.
站着的时候别把双手插在口袋里。
She blushed with embarrassment.
她难为情得脸红了。
His fingers were numb with cold.
他的手指冻麻了。
The shadows lengthened with the approach of sunset.
随着太阳西沉，影子越来越长。
Skill comes with practice.
熟能生巧。
Marine mammals generally swim with the current.
海洋哺乳动物一般顺水而游。
The keys are with reception.
钥匙在服务台。
Leave it with me.
把这交给我吧。
She acted with a touring company for three years.
她在一巡回剧团里演出了三年。
I bank with HSBC.
我的钱存在汇丰银行里。
I could never part with this ring.
我永远也不摘掉这枚戒指。
Can we dispense with the formalities?
我们可以免去这些客套吗？
With all her faults I still love her.
尽管她有种种缺点，我依然爱着她。
Off to bed with you!
你给我睡觉去！
Down with school!
取缔学校！

他从来不喝酒。

酗酒
Wine contains about 10% alcohol.
葡萄酒含有约 10% 的酒精。
levels of alcohol in the blood
血液中酒精含量

他对过量饮酒后驾车一事表示服罪。
low-alcohol beer

eg2: the production of fuel for domestic consumption(= to be used in the country where it is produced)
供国内消耗的燃料生产
Gas and oil consumption always increases in cold weather.
燃气和燃油的消耗量在天冷时总会增加。
The meat was declared unfit for human consumption .
这种肉被宣布不适于人食用。
He was advised to reduce his alcohol consumption.
他被劝告减少饮酒。
Her speech to party members was not intended for public consumption(= to be heard by the public) .
她对党员发表的讲话并不打算公诸大众。
Consumption rather than saving has become the central feature of contemporary societies.
现代社会的主要特征是消费而不是储蓄。

ex: vt. 渴望；恳求
vi. 渴望；恳求

eg2: You just crave this person.
你只是渴望这个人。
Sometimes I crave sushi.
有时我渴望寿司。
If I could find exercises I enjoyed then I’d not only want to do them, I’d  doing them.
如果能发现我喜欢的锻炼方式，那么我就不只是想要去做，而是渴望去做。

ex: n. 克里斯（姓）

wp.empirical equation: 经验方程;经验公式;经验方程式;方程式
wp.empirical value: 经验值;实验数值;经验经验值
wp.empirical a: 以经验为依据的;经验的

ex: adj. 经验主义的，完全根据经验的；实证的
eg2: Despite their generality, however, these subjects seem to us essentially , and our arguments against theory will not apply to them.
然而，抛开它们的普遍性，这些主题在我们看来本质上非常经验主义，我们反对理论的论点不适用于它们。
But now suppose we approach the question from a -I don't say from an empirical point of view but from a speculative anthropological point of view.
现在假设我们从一个特定角度来看这个问题,我不会说从一个经验主义的角度,而是从一个推测的人类学的角度来看。
This, of course, is what we've studied recurrently and, I have to say, empirically because these are all empirical facts about language, as the Russian formalists insisted.
这当然是我反复地，以经验主义方式研究的，因为这些都是语言的经验主义的事实,正如俄国，形式主义者坚持的。

ex: vt. 颁布；制定法律；扮演；发生
eg2: He wanted to enact an irresponsible tax cut, largely for the benefit of the wealthiest Americans.
他意图颁布一个主要惠及美国最富有人群的不负责任的减税法案。
